about_the_game:
Battow - Mages And Monsters is a bouncing bullet game, the player clicks somewhere on the screen for the Mage to throw a spell in that direction. The spell bounces off the walls of the scene, and the player will need to use this to their advantage to hit the rival. Every time the player collects a chest or shield, he is protected for one round, that is, will defend himself if he is hit by the monster's spell. It's a relaxing atmosphere game, simple and easy to play. There are 5 Mages, 20 monsters and 100 levels.

Note: The game's main screen is in English, however, this game does not require knowledge of any specific language, it is a game that anyone can play without any difficulty. This game does not require any internet connection. Saving and loading are automatic and eliminate the need for load and save buttons as well as multiple data storage drawers.

In this version 4.0 updated on December 11, 2024, we included controller support, and now the user can switch between mouse and joystick in a practical way, and to do this simply click the right mouse button or the key corresponding to "Fire 2" on the joystick, the "Fire 2" key on the Xbox is equivalent to the "B" button on the controller.
